page.title: 01THE NORTH BEDFORD AREA
page.content: Since the 1960's the southern portion of this area has undergone considerable change.In particular new housing estates have been built at Brickhill and Woodside.All of this residential area is quite flat.The north of the area comprises mainly agricultural land the villages of Renhold and Ravensden and some hamlets.This agricultural area is gently undulating. As the area has developed it has been carefully planned.Mowsbury Park is a large recreational area and houses have been in the main built in clusters with open areas of grass,shrubs and trees giving a feeling of 'openness' to the entire development. Many of the following pages contain data collected in a survey of 200 homes around Scott Lower School.
